title: 129 Mellany Klompe, leading regen farmer going all in on nutrient density
subtitle: 129 Mellany Klompe, leading regen farmer going all in on nutrient density
summary:
A conversation with Mellany Klompe, co-founder of Soil Heroes and director of the Soil Heroes Foundation about how measuring nutrient density is key towards having our farmers as well as consumers on board with regenerative transition.
